original_text: The Lord said to Moses, “Cut for yourself two tablets of stone like the first, and I will write on the tablets the words that were on the first tablets, which you broke.
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시되 너는 돌판 둘을 처음 것과 같이 다듬어 만들라 네가 깨뜨린 처음 판에 있던 말을 내가 그 판에 쓰리니

sentences.original_text: Cut for yourself two tablets of stone
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 위해 돌 판 두 개를 깎아라

sentences.original_text: and I will write on the tablets
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 그 판들에 쓸 것이다

sentences.original_text: the words that were on the first tablets
